name: Kunming
title: Kunming - Traveling China like your home yard
overview: Kunming, the capital of Yunnan Province, is known as the 'City of Eternal Spring' due to its pleasant year-round climate. Famous for its diverse ethnic cultures, beautiful natural scenery, and proximity to attractions like the Stone Forest and Dianchi Lake, Kunming serves as a gateway to exploring Yunnan's rich cultural and natural heritage.

highlights.attractions: Stone Forest, Dianchi Lake, Green Lake Park, Yuantong Temple, Western Hills
highlights.cuisine: Cross-bridge Rice Noodles, Steam Pot Chicken, Yunnan Ham, Wild Mushrooms
highlights.bestTime: Year-round destination with mild climate, best in Spring and Autumn
